item.title: This Fourth-Generation Pork Farmer’s Software Company Has Nearly $5 Million in Revenue
item.description: Iowa-based SwineTech uses AI to help farms take better care of their animals and manage their teams.

item.title: AI May Worsen Ageism in Hiring. Here’s Why
item.description: Finding a new gig if you’re older than 50 may be getting tougher, and the same tech is hitting Gen-Z’s jobs prospects.

item.title: Humanoid Robot Company Figure Is Valued at $39 Billion. Its Goal Is ‘Human-Level Intelligence’
item.description: Figure announced a $1 billion series C round of funding from investors including Nvidia, Salesforce, Qualcomm Ventures, and more.

item.title: 5 Reasons to Apply for Inc.’s Best in Business 2025
item.description: Be recognized and celebrated for your company’s successes and how it stands out from the competition.

item.title: Why the First Amendment Doesn’t Stop Employers From Firing Workers Cheering Kirk’s Murder
item.description: The right to free speech won’t protect people from social media posts or public behavior that a company believes would be detrimental to its business.
